scripts.start: npm install && node -e console.clear() && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.start-manual-transfer: npm install && node -e console.clear() && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./src/manualTransfer.js
scripts.start-multiclient: npm install && node -e console.clear() && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./src/multiclient.js
